{"id":612202582,"lang":"cpp","time":"3 months, 1 week","timestamp":1641224181,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"11 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/612202582/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Palindrome","memory":"7.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool isAlNum(char ch)\n    {\n        if((ch >= 'a' && ch <= 'z') || (ch >= '0' && ch <= '9') || (ch >= 'A' && ch <= 'Z'))\n            return true;\n        return false;\n            \n    }\n    \n    char convert(char ch)\n    {\n        if(ch >= 'A' && ch <= 'Z')\n            return ch + 32;\n        return ch;\n    }\n    \n    bool isPalindrome(string s) {\n        \n        /*\n        ATTEMPT 1\n        ---------\n        string res = \"\";\n        for(int i = 0; i < s.length(); i++)\n        {\n            if((s[i] >= 'a' && s[i] <= 'z') || (s[i] >= '0' && s[i] <= '9'))\n                res += s[i];\n            else if(s[i] >= 'A' && s[i] <= 'Z')\n            {\n                char ch = s[i] - 'A' + 'a';\n                res += ch;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        string temp = \"\";\n        for(int i = 0; i < res.length(); i++)\n            temp = res[i] + temp;\n        \n        return temp == res;\n        */\n        \n        for(int i = 0, j = s.length() - 1; i < j; i++, j--)\n        {\n            while(!isAlNum(s[i]) && i < j)\n                i++;\n            while(!isAlNum(s[j]) && i < j)\n                j--;\n            if(convert(s[i]) != convert(s[j]))\n                return false;\n        }\n        \n        return true;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-palindrome"}
